Serializable
Enclosing class:
UIManagerUtil
public static class UIManagerUtil.NimbusLookAndFeelCustomLight extends NimbusLookAndFeel
a subclass of NimbusLookAndFeel with changing colors as suitable for modern Windows.
Since:
1.6.1
